crew.overview: This documentary is hosted by William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy and they take us through the history of Trek. We also get to see bloopers from the original series and the current space program and how progression has been in reality, hosted by LeVar Burton.
crew.title: Star Trek 25th Anniversary Special

crew.original_title: Inside Star Trek: The Real Story
crew.overview: Who directed the pilot for the original Star Trek series? Where was it filmed? Who really built the Enterprise? You may own The Star Trek Encyclopaedia, and you may have seen every episode, but you still don't have all the answers! For the first time, the men and women who worked behind the scenes on the most popular science fiction television series ever created invite you to go boldly where no fan has gone before. In-depth interviews will introduce you to the writers, directors, producers, technicians and artists who breathed life into the original Star Trek series. You'll discover their greatest joys, their deepest sorrows and everything else you ever wanted to know about the greatest show in the galaxy. There are no actors and no special effects. Just the truth.
crew.title: Inside Star Trek: The Real Story

crew.overview: Spring Break 24/7 -- Line up for a body shot! This is the ultimate Spring Break experience from National Lampoon! Starring hot pin up Nikki Ziering and using footage from all three National Lampoon Spring Break Vacation spots: Las Vegas Cabo San Lucas and San Pedro.
crew.title: Spring Break 24/7

crew.overview: Behind the scenes of Friday the 13th.
crew.title: Crystal Lake Victims Tell All

crew.overview: Behind the scenes of Friday the 13th.
crew.title: Secrets Galore Behind the Gore

crew.overview: 2004 documentary of the Friday the 13th franchise for the 5-disc DVD boxset From Crystal Lake to Manhattan.
crew.title: The Friday the 13th Chronicles

crew.original_title: The Star Trek Saga: From One Generation To The Next
crew.overview: This special is hosted by Patrick Stewart and traced the history of Star Trek from its inception with "The Cage" through to Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home and the first season of Star Trek: The Next Generation. It also showed brief previews of Star Trek V: The Final Frontier and TNG's second season. Also it was principally a container for the premiere of a full color print of "The Cage" which had, according to the special, recently been recovered from Paramount's studio archives.
crew.title: The Star Trek Saga: From One Generation To The Next

crew.original_title: Journey's End: The Saga of Star Trek - The Next Generation
crew.overview: Your destination: the 24th century. Your mission: to voyage where few have gone before--behind the scenes of Star Trek: The Next Generation! Join Jonathan Frakes, Next Generation's Commander William Riker, for this fascinating chronicle of Gene Roddenberry's beloved, Emmy Award-winning series.
crew.title: Journey's End: The Saga of Star Trek - The Next Generation

crew.original_title: Journey's End: The Saga of Star Trek - The Next Generation
crew.overview: Your destination: the 24th century. Your mission: to voyage where few have gone before--behind the scenes of Star Trek: The Next Generation! Join Jonathan Frakes, Next Generation's Commander William Riker, for this fascinating chronicle of Gene Roddenberry's beloved, Emmy Award-winning series.
crew.title: Journey's End: The Saga of Star Trek - The Next Generation

crew.original_title: Star Trek: Voyager - Inside the New Adventure
crew.overview: Star Trek: Voyager – Inside the New Adventure was a special documentary, running for 50 minutes, produced by BECK-OLA Productions for broadcasting by UPN on 9 January 1995, the week prior to the premiere of Star Trek: Voyager. Hosted by Robert Picardo, the program went behind the scenes at the making of the pilot episode, "Caretaker", as well as the creation of the series itself. Segments included interviews with the cast and crew, as well as a "day-in-the-life" feature following Ethan Phillips during the filming of the Ocampa desert scenes.
crew.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Inside the New Adventure

crew.original_title: Star Trek: Voyager - Inside the New Adventure

Hosted by Robert Picardo, the program went behind the scenes at the making of the pilot episode, "Caretaker", as well as the creation of the series itself.
